duties_responsibilities.duty: Implementation and operation of a DoD IS or system DoD Component within their CE.
Obtain and maintain IA certification appropriate to position in accordance to DoD 8570.01-M.
Understanding of the DOD Risk Management Framework Process (RMF), Certification and Accreditation (C&A) process.
Knowledge of IA policy, procedures, and structure to develop, implement, and maintain a secure CE.
Knowledge of how to use scanning and security assessment tools: RETINA, Security Readiness Review (SRR) scripts, STIG compliance, and DISA Gold-Disk.

education_certification.credential: Preferred Associate’s degree in Cyber Security, OR five (5) years of recent specialized experience.
